result.execSummary:
All charges against Randall Jay Laduke in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Randall Jay Laduke is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Randall Jay Laduke

defendant.name: Laduke, Randall Jay
defendant.address: 1852 100th St (County Rd I), Balsam Lake, WI 54810

records.addlTxt:
9:07 AM Defendant Randall Jay Laduke in court. Attorney Nicholas R White in court for Randall Jay Laduke.  Attorney David Stilin in court for State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk. ADA states file 22CF217 will be read-in and dismissed as part of resolution. Felony warnings given. 
On count 1- def- G plea. On count 3- def- G plea. CT accepts pleas, adj G on each count. Count 2 is RI&D as is 22CF217. Arguments. Def requests to waive PSI. CT finds waiver is made FK&V. 

SENTENCE:
Count 1: W/held up to 3 years probation. $10 fine plus costs plus drug abuse surcharge, $250 DNA surcharge, totaling $550.05. DNA sample. May not possess or use firearms and, if considered a violent felony, no body armor. Cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored. If not a US citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights. 12 months banked/stayed jail. Not subj to GT. If def objects to any banked jail request, must file request for hearing within 5 days of request. 
Probation conditions on both: AODA and comply.  Not to have contact with known users/dealers except as necessary for treatment or in a confinement setting. Any programming/treatment required by agent. No drugs without a prescription and only in amount prescribed. No drug paraphernalia. 

Count 3: W/held 1 year probation. Concurrent to count 1. 30 days banked/stayed jail. Not subj to GT. $10 fine plus costs plus surcharge, $200 DNA surcharge, totaling $475.05. DNA sample. Same probation conditions. 60 dtp or set up PP with COCC. FTP- judgment. Must report to Probation today. PCR. 9:35 am adj.
